name: Guitar Hero: Smash Hits
description:
Guitar Hero: Smash Hits is an arcade game developed by Beenox and Beenox Studios. It was originally released in 2009. It was published by Activision Blizzard. Most rawgers rated the game as "Recommended".
Guitar Hero: Smash Hits is available on PlayStation 2, PlayStation 3 and Wii. You can purchase the game on Nintendo eShop.
